```{r}
library(MASS)
library(ISLR2)
rm(list=ls())
attach(Auto)
```

9a)

```{r}
pairs(Auto)
```

9b)

```{r}
#Filters out non-numeric columns
is_numeric <- sapply(Auto, is.numeric)
numeric_Auto <- Auto[, is_numeric]
correlation_matrix <- cor(numeric_Auto)
correlation_matrix
```

9c) Moderate relationship between predictors and response; origin, weight and year are significant predictors. as year increases by 1, mpg tends to increase by 0.750773.

```{r}
mlr_mpg = lm(mpg ~ cylinders+displacement+horsepower+weight+acceleration+year+origin)
summary(mlr_mpg)
```

9d) High leverage point, Residual chart seems to have U shape

```{r}
par(mfrow = c(2, 2))
plot(mlr_mpg)
```

9e)

```{r}
mlr_mpg2 = lm(mpg ~ cylinders*horsepower)
summary(mlr_mpg2)
```

9f)

```{r}
mlr_mpg3 = lm(mpg ~ cylinders^2)
summary(mlr_mpg3)
```
